name: Directed Reading on Canadian Institutions and International Development
description: This Directed Readings course is designed for students who already have an ongoing working relationship with a Canadian Development institution (both non-government organizations and private agencies). The course will run parallel to the work experience. Students interested in this course must contact and obtain permission from the CCDS Associate Director prior to the beginning of term.
prerequisites: IDSA01H3 and [1.0 credit at the B-level in IDS courses]
